# Draft:Transfer Kingdom

----
Transfer Kingdom
Transfer Kingdom is a Houston, Texas–based company founded in 2019 by Innovation SA Inc., providing custom printing solutions for the custom apparel industry. The company specializes in Direct-to-Film (DTF) transfers, offering both custom and ready-to-press designs that can be applied to a wide variety of garments. It conducts most of its business through its e-commerce website, [https://transferkingdom.com transferkingdom.com], and operates a retail location in Houston that serves customers from the United States.
History
Founded in 2019, Transfer Kingdom began as an online platform serving apparel businesses and individuals looking for custom heat transfers. In 2024, the company expanded its operations by opening a physical retail store in Houston, Texas, to complement its online presence. The store offers various products including pre-made DTF transfers, gang sheets, blank apparel, and application tools.
Products and Services
Transfer Kingdom’s product offerings include:
* Custom DTF Transfers: Users can upload artwork or select from ready-to-press options.
* Gang Sheet Builder: An online tool for compiling multiple designs into a single print sheet.
* Glitter DTF Transfers: Specialty transfers with glitter-enhanced visuals.
* UV Stickers: Durable, adhesive prints suitable for smooth surfaces like glass, metal, and plastic.
* Blank Apparel: Wholesale garments including t-shirts, hoodies, and onesies.
Operations
Orders placed before 5 AM CST are typically processed the same business day. The company provides standard and expedited shipping options, as well as local in-store pickup for Houston-area customers. Its physical retail store is open daily.
Customer Feedback
As of July 2025, Transfer Kingdom holds an average rating of 4.7 out of 5 stars on Trustpilot, based on over 140 verified customer reviews. Customers frequently mention fast production times and consistent print quality.
Recognition
The company is listed in several business directories and industry platforms. It continues to grow its customer base through e-commerce and direct retail.
